mapper.sql: ID, EMPLOYEE_CODE, PRI, PIC, PWD, CARD,DELETED,BATCH_DATE, CRE_PRO_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE, MOD_PRO_ID, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE
mapper.select:
select
from T_EMPLOYEE_DEVICE_INFO where DELETED = '0' AND EMPLOYEE_CODE = #{employeeCode}
mapper.insert: insert into T_EMPLOYEE_DEVICE_INFO (ID, EMPLOYEE_CODE, PRI, PIC, PWD, CARD, DELETED,BATCH_DATE, CRE_PRO_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE, MOD_PRO_ID, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE) values (#{id}, #{employeeCode}, #{pri}, #{pic}, #{pwd}, #{card}, #{deleted},#{batchDate}, #{creProId}, #{createdBy}, #{createdDate}, #{modProId}, #{lastModifiedBy}, #{lastModifiedDate})

SELECT S_T_EMPLOYEE_DEVICE_INFO.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
insert into T_EMPLOYEE_DEVICE_INFO
ID,
EMPLOYEE_CODE,
PRI,
PIC,
PWD,
CARD,
DELETED,
BATCH_DATE,
CRE_PRO_ID,

mapper.update:
update T_EMPLOYEE_DEVICE_INFO
EMPLOYEE_CODE = #{employeeCode},
PRI = #{pri},
PIC = #{pic},
PWD = #{pwd},
CARD = #{card},
DELETED = #{deleted},
BATCH_DATE = #{batchDate},
CRE_PRO_ID = #{creProId},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy},
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate},
MOD_PRO_ID = #{modProId},
LAST_MODIFIED_BY = #{lastModifiedBy},
LAST_MODIFIED_DATE = #{lastModifiedDate},
where ID = #{id}

update T_EMPLOYEE_DEVICE_INFO set EMPLOYEE_CODE = #{employeeCode}, PRI = #{pri}, PIC = #{pic}, PWD = #{pwd}, CARD = #{card}, DELETED = #{deleted}, BATCH_DATE = #{batchDate}, CRE_PRO_ID = #{creProId}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy}, CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate}, MOD_PRO_ID = #{modProId}, LAST_MODIFIED_BY = #{lastModifiedBy}, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE = #{lastModifiedDate} where ID = #{id}
